main event: A civilian observed a large, aluminum object resembling a conventional aircraft over Osborn, Ohio on June 29, 1949.
interesting points: The object was observed for 3-4 seconds,No sound was heard from the object despite its speed,The object's wings may have moved up and down during the sighting,It disappeared into the clouds at an altitude of 2000-6000 feet,The observer, a radio engineer, was considered reliable.
sighted object: one aluminum object resembling a conventional aircraft
